Outcold Solutions | Technical Evangelist / Customer Success Engineer | REMOTE | Full-time or Part-time

We are a small engineering focused company. We have built a product, that helps our customers to Monitor their Kubernetes, OpenShift and Docker clusters in Splunk. We are only one year in business, have paid enterprise customers.

We are looking for someone to join our team to:

- write blog posts on the subject (https://www.outcoldsolutions.com/blog/), information about new features, how we address some of the use cases, and related topics that can bring more attention to our product. - create tutorials, videos, write documentation on setting up our solutions in various cloud environments, including public and private cloud. - work closely with our customers, show demos, answer questions.

We are looking for someone with similar experience, passion for learning new technologies, self-motivated and excited about writing blogs and making tutorials. We are a self-funded company (not a startup), we offer a salary and possible a % of the net income (to keep you motivated).

Send links to your blog posts to jobs@outcoldsolutions.com
